description: Readers of the Book of Mormon can easily miss how subsequent Book of Mormon prophets adopted the imagery and language of Lehi’s tree-of-life vision in their own teachings to emphasize their importance and to highlight key messages in the Book of Mormon.

pages.title: Mists of Darkness
pages.description: Readers of the Book of Mormon can easily miss how subsequent Book of Mormon prophets adopted the imagery and language of Lehi’s tree-of-life vision in their own teachings to emphasize their importance and to highlight key messages in the Book of Mormon.
